comments:
-Right click on a package within project1, choose copy from the context menu.
-Paste inside the java source folder of project2

The package name is copied but the contents of the package are not. Exception 
is thrown.

Workaround - Right click on project1 and choose refresh. You are now able to 
copy packages.

Note - This defect only appears on certain workspaces. When it appears it is 
100% reproducible.

Note - I can give you a workspace that demonstrates this defect, if needed.

looks like it happens when a package gets out of synch with the file system
we need to have some story for such cases
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 13856 ***
